Articles.Content: is there a mod for ksp that adds iva to the EAS-1 external command seat
I would guess that it is somewhere in the modding sub-forums, which this thread now occupies. (Moved.)
Kerbal First Person EVA might work. Never used it myself, though.

Noice, I needed something like that for the EVA report contracts, since I usually struggle a bit to get my heading right while on a hike due to the camera and the lack of a navball or any kind of compass. And I tend to walk A LOT.
